keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Sabeen Mahmud was shot shortly after hosting an event on human rights abuses in Baluchistan Province at the popular arts center she ran, The Second Floor.

headline.print_headline: Gunmen in Pakistan Kill an Advocate of the Arts
headline.main: Gunmen Kill Arts Advocate in Pakistan After Human Rights Event

snippet: Sabeen Mahmud was shot shortly after hosting an event on human rights abuses in Baluchistan Province at the popular arts center she ran, The Second Floor.
abstract: Sabeen Mahmud, director of popular arts center The Second Floor, is shot and killed in Karachi, Pakistan, shortly after hosting contentious discussion about human rights abuses in region.
